msbt.message: Who's ready for some seasports? You, that's who! Nyuk nyuk!I'm here in front ofone, uh probably caffeinated fish fan for the apex of seasports action.Yo, I'm C.J. and I'm here to anchor a once-in-a-season fishing deluge. It'sthe Fishing Tourney!It all starts at , so shine those hooks and get your reels READY! Whew. It's WAY too early for that much hype
Glad I caught ya, flyfisher! You look hyped. You look ready. You look caffeinated. I gotta get on that.Anywave, the big Fishing Tourney shoves off at . Can't wait to see you there. Nyuk nyuk!

To me, the Fishing Tourney's about showin' off the sport from all angles. Folks catching fish is just the bait.Everyone's got a hook. Fishing's got drama, adventureSMELLS! There's just so much to nibble. Nyuk nyuk!
The Fishing Tourney starts at ! Get HYPE! Nyuk nyuk!

Yo, flyfisher? You know you're still swimmin' in points from the last tourney, right? Let's see Yep! You've got <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" /> floatin' in your tackle box. Wanna net yourself some swag for of 'em?
Gimme that fish swag!
Nah.

Hey, flyfisher! You know you still got some points bobbin' around from the last tourney, right?It ain't the deepest pool, but there's still <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" /> in the tank. You want some fish swag?
Let's do it!
Nah.
What up, flyfisher?
Let's do it!
I'm just hangin' out.

Yo! What up, seasports fan! I'm C.J. coming at you live You know what? It's too early for that. I'll save it.So you know I'll be anchorin' the big Fishing Tourney, right? It sets sail at . I'm gonna bring the hype!Uh Just as soon as I've had some more coffee. Nyuk!
Oh Y'know, I'd love to, but your pockets, they're kinda full. Go drop some cargo and we'll do this, OK?
You got it, chum!
THERE'S a keeper! Your very own . Nyuk nyuk!
Oh, hey, don't forget that the big Fishing Tourney starts at ! It's gonna be a total lunker! Nyuk!
The Fishing Tourney goes till ! There's plenty of fish in the seaand rivers and ponds too, so get castin'!
Oh, and just so you know, you still got a bunch of points in your fishbowl, butWell, your pockets are full. No big deal. Just go drop some cargo and then I can hook you up. Nyuk!
Looks like you still got a few points on the line. Could I lure you into spendin' a few more? Nyuk!
Sure, why not?
Nah.
No worries, I get it. Cruise on back anytime. The swag'll be here. Nyuk!
It's all good. Just FYI, I'm sailin' off around if you change your mind. Nyuk!

It all comes down to this. Every hook, every line, every sinker. The time has comefor the Fishing Tourney.I'm C.J., and as always, I'm your anchor for this once-a-season event. So get set, 'cause it's castin' time!

The rules of the Fishing Tourney are easy breezy. You just gotta catch as many fish as you can in minutes.Every fish you catch nets you points. Net enough points and you can swap 'em for some slick fish swag.Also, there's a cooler in the tent. Any fish you catch will automatically get stowed there. Keeps the pockets dry!That means as long as you've got a fishing rod, you have all you need to compete. Nyuk!

The rules of the Fishing Tourney are easy breezy. You just gotta catch as many fish as you can in minutes.Every fish you catch nets you points. Net enough points and you can swap 'em for some slick fish swag.You could also end up reelin' in extra points for fish caught by others. So, more folks might mean more points!Also, there's a cooler in the tent. Any fish you catch will automatically get stowed there. Keeps the pockets dry!That means as long as you've got a fishing rod, you have all you need to compete. Nyuk!
Simple, right? And you can enter as many times as you like.Whaddaya say? Ready to get your feet wet in the Fishing Tourney? The entry fee is waived for the first run.
Sign me up!
What're the rules?
Swap my points for swag!
Nah. I'm good.
What? Really? Way to be the one that got awayWell, alright. The Fishing Tourney is on till if the tide decides to turn for ya. Cruise by whenever.

Who's ready for some seasports? You, that's who! Nyuk nyuk!I'm here in front of, uhjust you right nowfor the apex of seasports action, the Fishing Tourney!My name's C.J. and I'm your anchor for this once-in-a-season fishing deluge. Nyuk nyuk!So shine those hooks and get your reels ready, 'cause between now and , it's tourney time!

Yo! What up, seasports fan! I'm C.J. coming at you live Hang on, of COURSE I'm live. I'm right here.Anywave, I'm anchorin' the premiere event of the seasports season, the Fishing Tourney.So shine those hooks and get your reels ready, 'cause between now and , the tourney is ON!

You got it, chum. Nyuk nyuk!The rules of the Fishing Tourney are easy breezy. You just gotta catch as many fish as you can in minutes.Every fish you catch nets you points. Net enough points and you can swap 'em for some slick fish swag.You could also end up reelin' in extra points for fish caught by others. So, more folks might mean more points!
Sorry, but no. If you ain't got at least points, then you're not gettin' fish swag. You gotta earn it. Nyuk!
Only <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" />, huh? Hey, it's all good. Nyuk!
<50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" />! Oh.
You can cast yourself out there as many times as you wanna. The tourney's on till . Nyuk!
OK, the next Fishing Tourney comes ashore in of next year. I'd better catch you there! Nyuk!
OK, I wanna see you reelin' in the points at the next Fishing Tourney when it makes landfall in .
Exactly <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" />! Just enough for some fish swag.
Gimme that fish swag!
Maybe later.
<50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" />! Reel nice! Wanna swap points for some fresh fish swag?
Gimme that fish swag!
Maybe later.
I am packed to the gills with Fishing Tourney knowledge. Ask me almost anything!
I wanna compete!
What're the rules?
There's something else...
Nah.
Oh, uhOK, then! Glad I couldnot help. Well, I'm here till today if you get a brain wave! Nyuk nyuk!

Somethin' else likeOH! Have I told you about my livestream and needin' fresh fish to gush over? Nyuk!If you got fish to sell, I wanna pay too much for 'em. You get paid, and my followers keep followin'. Win-win!
Let's sell some fish!
Swap my points for swag!
About the tourney...
Nah. I'm good.
Fintastic! What're you sellin'?
Spillin' a whole school, huh? All together that's. How's that sound?
Sold!
Nah.
! Reel nice!How 'bout for your . Sound good?
Sold!
Nah.
SPLASH! Now you're swimmin' in Bells. Paddle back if you catch anythin' else to sell! Nyuk!
Uh What fish? Hang on, you're trawling me, right? Ha ha ha! That's pretty good.Anywave, I can't buy what you don't have. No big, though. Just drift back after you get a nibble or two. Nyuk!
Oh. Well, you're the navigator. Nyuk!

YES! Nobody can resist the siren song of the Fishing Tourney. Are you ready to get Uh, wait up.How're you gonna compete without a fishing rod? No rod, no entry. Sorry, but them's the breakwaters. Nyuk!
Uh I love your passion, but it looks like your Bells are runnin' kinda shallow! Nyuk!That fee keeps the fish fund funded and all that fun fin fluff, friend. Phew, that's hard to say!
YES! Nobody can resist the siren song of the Fishing Tourney.One thing. Since you already sailed the tourney seas today, I gotta have for your entry fee. Cool?
Very cool!
No, thanks.
Knew you'd be on board! That'll be .

Alright, I'm gonna spray minutes on the clock for you to catch as many fish as you can.Oh! And there's also a bonus that'll backstroke in if you catch at least fish. Nyuk!You done nibblin' on all that? 'Cause it's time to launch!

OK, I'm gonna spray minutes on the clock for you to catch as many fish as you can.Everyone embarks at the same time too. Keeps things on an even keel.And also! There's a bonus that'll backstroke in if you manage to catch at least fish. Nyuk!On board with all that? Then let's launch!
Aye aye!

Cool. Hey, uh 's still got fish in the cooler. Know the deal with that?I can't ship another round till that thing's empty. Tourney rules. Nyuk!If you see , get 'em to empty the cooler. I'll even buy the fish, if it helps.

Sweet. Hey, uh Someone's still got fish in the cooler. Any idea what's up with that?I can't launch another round till that thing's empty. Tourney rules. Nyuk!Mind gettin' the word out so we can empty that cooler? Mention I'll buy the fish if you fathom it'll help.
I fathom there's some anglers still lobbin' bobbers out there. Swim by later and I'll help you out. Nyuk!
Come on, flyfisher! You got a tourney to quench! Nyuk!
What're you babblin' at me for? Go catch somethin'! Nyuk!
Those fish ain't gonna catch themselves! Nyuk!
Glad to meet a fellow fishionista, but right now is "Fishing Tourney" time, not "spout at C.J." time. Good luck!
And that's gonna do it for this 's Fishing Tourney! How was it? Have fun?
Loved it!
It was OK.
Not really.
Reel glad to hear it, but you know that gushing won't get you extra points, right? Nyuk!
Hey, smooth sailin' is smooth sailin'. I'll take it.
Feelin' sea salty? Well, at least you're keepin' it reel
More importantly, your tackle box is soaked with points from the tourney!You have <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" />, which is EXACTLY enough to net some fish swag. Whaddaya say?
Gimme that fish swag!
Nah.

But that's not important. What IS important is that you've got a cargo hold full of points from the tourney!You've got <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="points" b="point" c="points" />, and you could net some fish swag with of 'em. Whaddaya say?
Gimme that fish swag!
Nah.
The next Fishing Tourney sets sail in . Hope I catch you then! Nyuk nyuk!
The next Fishing Tourney embarks in of next year. Hope you'll paddle by. Nyuk nyuk!

What up, fishionista? C.J. here and WOW am I wrung out from anchorin' today's Fishing Tourney.I gotta be honest, I don't remember if I saw you out there today. But my mind's kinda out to sea right nowAnywave, looks like you've got a few points in your pool. Wanna swap 'em for some swag? Nyuk!
Swap my points for swag!
I'm just hangin' out.

What up, fishionista? C.J. here and WOW am I wrung out from anchorin' today's Fishing Tourney.I gotta be honest, I don't remember if I saw you out there today. But my mind's kinda out to sea right nowAnywave, check the schedule if you want in on the next Fishing Tourney. Hope it reels you in! Nyuk, nyuk!
Cool! Always happy to meet a fellow fishionista. I'll be moored here till if you need somethin'.
Yo, flyfisher!
Swap my points for swag!
I'm just hangin' out.
I'm anchorin' 's next Fishing Tourney too. That'll be in . Catch you then! Nyuk!
That Fishing Tourney was a rush, wasn't it? Like, you could FEEL the tension on the line. Nyuk!I'm absolutely HOOKED on doin' streams for the Fishing Tourneys. The chat always goes WILD!
That was some serious seasports. You could feel the tension creepin' in like a tide! Nyuk nyuk!Well, another , another Fishing Tourney in the creel! Can't wait for the next one!

Well, that's gonna do it for the Fishing Tourney season.The next Fishing Tourney will be in of next year. So until then, this is C.J., sailin' off. Nyuk!Uhactually, I'm still gonna be here for a swell. Sorry. Livestream habit
Next year's Fishing Tourneys are gonna need a perfect storm to top this What a year! Nyuk!

What up, fishing fan! C.J. here, comin' at you live from, uh r-right in front of you. Nyuk!You cruised in from off-island, right? Welcome to 's Fishing Tourney!Oh! But the latest run already set sail, so if you want in you'll have to tread water till the next one.

Huh! I wasn't sure I had what it took, but wow! This is goin' SUPER good. Like, it's just flowin'! Nyuk!Oh, hey! Guess I drifted for a secThe latest run of the tourney has already set sail. Mind treadin' water till the next one? Won't be long.

I wanna bring the fishing hype to EVERYBODY. Young, old, frogs, cats, horses, gators, robotseverybody!That means you too, except uh looks like it's gonna be a few minutes until a pier opens up.Just tread water for a swell and I'll get you in, alright? Nyuk!

I see ya. You're hyped. You're ready. You've charted your course to Fishing Tourney glory. I love it.But hold your seahorses. The latest run's still goin'. You'll be able to stow away on the next one. Nyuk!
Yo yo yo! Had a look in your cooler lately? If you've got fish in there to sell, then I wanna buy. Nyuk!
Sell 'em all!
What cooler?
Let me check...
How's sound? That hook you?
Sell! Sell! Sell!
Wait up.
You got it! Eh, wait. Hang onyou been lootin' galleons or something? Your hold's too full for more Bells.No big. I'll just wire it to your account.
What a haul! Thanks!
You got it! Uh, hang onyou been chasin' treasure maps or something? Your hold's too full for more Bells.No big. I got a few pouches here. I'll just stick the extra Bells in those.
Also, I'll make sure the cooler's clear if you wanna surf the tourney again. Nyuk nyuk!
Anywave, the next Fishing Tourney sets sail in . Hope I catch you there! Nyuk!
Oh yeah! The next Fishing Tourney embarks in of next year. Hope I catch you there! Nyuk!
Oh! The cooler stows all the fish you catch during the tourney. It's over in the tent if you wanna see.
No prob! By the way, I can't ship the next tourney round until the cooler's empty. Rules're rules. Nyuk!
Sounds good! I'm moored here till if you got anything in there you wanna sell. Nyuk!
Sure. I'll be cleanin' out the cooler at tomorrow, so fish out your fish before then. Nyuk!
Empty your cooler. Got it!
OK, let's see There's fish in the cooler. Add 'em up, carry the

Who's ready for some seasports? You, that's who! Nyuk nyuk!Yo, I'm C.J. and I'm anchorin'the FISHING TOURNEY! It's the apex of seasports ac—hang on a secDidn't I see you anglin' up a storm earlier? Yeah, I did! You're really castin' yourself out there!So how was it? Have fun? Nyuk!
Hey hey! There's my favorite angler! So how was it? Have fun? Nyuk!
Oh. They weren't bitin' for ya, huh
Hey, I don't know if I mentioned, but you get bonus points for wadin' into the tourney with off-island friends.'Cause friends that sail together prevail together!<10_4 /> OK, that needs work
Let's see how many points ya got.
Oh! Weren't nibblin' for ya, eh?OK, so it looks like the total haul for everyone was fish, with a co-op bonus wadin' in at or more fish.

The fish you caught are all partyin' in the cooler. You can fetch 'em later.Or if you don't want 'em, I'll buy 'em. I need fresh fish for my livestream to keep my followers followin'. Nyuk!But first things first. Let's check out what you caught in the tourney!
Looks like you stowed fish in the cooler.
Looks like you stowed fish in the cooler. Oh! With a solo bonus wading in at or more fish.
OK, so it looks like the total haul for everyone was fish, with a co-op bonus wadin' in at or more fish.Also, you brought in fish. Reel nice!
Alright, it looks like the total haul for everyone was fish, with a co-op bonus wadin' in at or more fish.And YOU caught fish with a solo bonus floatin' in at or more fish.
pour that into your points pool

Yo! What up! I'm C.J., and I'm here anchorin'the FISHING TOURNEY! It's the apex of—hang on a sec.Didn't I see you anglin' up a storm earlier? Yeah, I did! You're really castin' yourself out there!So how was it? Have fun? Nyuk!

Yo! What up! I'm C.J., and I'm here anchorin'the FISHING TOURNEY! It's the apex of—hang on a sec.Didn't I see you anglin' up a storm earlier? Yeah, I did! You're really castin' yourself out there!So how was it? Have fun? Nyuk!
SPLASH! That's <50_8 x="0" y="7" a="points" b="point" c="points" />!
I am SO hyped!
Once you net or more points, you can swap 'em for some slick fish swag. Give it a whirl!
Alright. Looks like there were fish bathing in the cooler. You got a reel angle on anglin'. Nice!

Oh, hey. The cooler can tilt if you stick over 20 fish in there. I didn't want it capsizin', so I took a few out.Don't worry. I shipped 'em off to a way-slick fish sanctuary. They're gonna love it there. Nyuk nyuk!You're still gonna net points for everything, so I hope we're still on an even keel.
Anywave! On top of the standard points you earned, you'll also get a bonus for catchin' or more fish!Oh, and the total haul for everyone was fish, with a co-op bonus wadin' in at or more.
Anywave! On top of the standard points you earned, you'll also get a bonus for haulin' in or more fish!

The fish that everyone caught are all partyin' in the cooler. You can sort out the keepers later.Or if nobody wants 'em, I'll buy 'em. I need fresh fish for my livestream to keep my followers followin'. Nyuk!But first things first. Let's check out how the tourney went!

The Fishing Tourney rules are easy breezy. Everyone just has to catch as many fish as they can in minutes.Each fish caught nets points. Doesn't matter who caught 'em.BUT! If you tugged in some friends, you gotta pick a Team Leader, 'cause ONLY the Leader earns points.After everyone nets enough points, the Leader can swap 'em for some super slick fish swag.

Also, there's a cooler in the tent. Any fish you catch will automatically get stowed there. Keeps the pockets dry!That means as long as you've got a fishing rod, you have all you need to compete. Nyuk!

Alright, I'm gonna spray minutes on the clock for everyone to catch as many fish as they can. No matter who catches 'em, the fish'll flop into the cooler and the Team Leader will earn points.Oh! And there's also a bonus that'll backstroke in if at least fish are caught. Nyuk nyuk!You done nibblin' all that? 'Cause it's time to launch!

If you tugged in some friends, you gotta pick a Team Leader, 'cause ONLY the Leader can earn points.And it doesn't matter who catches what. Every fish'll flop into the cooler and the Leader will earn points.Oh! The cooler! Any fish caught will automatically get stowed there. That way your pockets stay dry!
Simple, right? And you can enter as many times as you like.So whaddaya say, Team Leader? The Fishing Tourney awaits. Ready for another run? Entry is .
Sign me up!
Nah. I'm good.

Which means WHOA! I don't believe it!You've hooked a Fishing Tourney net total of over points! You're a castin' LEGEND!Wait'll my subscribers hear about this. I'm gonna get, like, new followers! Nyuk nyuk!
Which means INCREDIBLE!You've hooked a Fishing Tourney net total of over points. You're like a tidal force out there!Am I really standing in front of the next seasports superstar? Nyuk!

Which means Whoa! FINTASTIC!You've hooked a Fishing Tourney net total of over points. You're takin' the scene by storm!I can't wait to babble about this on my livestream. Chat's gonna turn into a maelstrom! Nyuk nyuk!
If you've got enough points in your pool, you can swap 'em for some slick fish swag.
Ahem! Way to make waves.I've got something special for surgin' to such a high-water mark. I fathom you'll like it. Keep an eye on the mail.
Fishing Tourney points don't spoil, so you can save some in your pool and use 'em in the next one! Nyuk!
Gimme that fish swag!
